trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around July 12th 2012
Summary: Night vision monucular capture Extremely fast star or meteor like object changing multiple direction,
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 1130 at night I observed a fast moving object with my night vision monucular at about 60 degrees above the horizon just above Ursa Major. I filmed the episode on a cheap portable DVR for about 5 seconds until I lost it. I was on my balcony in the heart of Yaletown, Vancouver, there were no clouds or airplanes in the vicinity or anything observable with the naked eye except a few stars. I was hoping to view a sateliite, which I did moments before ( also filmed) or at least it looked like one. When I first noticed the fast moving object, I thought it was a meteor but it soon changed direction moving from right to left then it immediately when straight down, lost it for a second and then it immediately when straight up but slow down, twirled like a toy and then picked up speed until I lost it...really have no idea what this could be ..no way it is a bird or any land object due to the monucular was focused to the stars at 5x power, a bug or bat would not be observed due to the size. I would love answers!! I have a 5 sec video but on MP4 format 11MB and can't attach as too big unless I figure a way to compress..please contact me and I can send via email. Thank you Charles
